Ergonomic Keyboard & Mouse.title: Ergonomic Keyboard & Mouse
reasons: Ergonomic keyboards and mice reduce strain and prevent long-term injury
Split keyboard design keeps your shoulders and wrists in natural positions
Ergonomic mouse keeps your hand in a natural handshake position

products.name: Logitech Ergo K860 + Lift Mouse
specs: Split curved keyboard reduces wrist strain
Cushioned wrist rest with memory foam
Lift vertical mouse in natural handshake position
products.why: The ultimate setup for comfort. The split keyboard and vertical mouse work together to keep your body in a natural position, significantly reducing pain during long computing sessions.

products.name: Microsoft Ergonomic Keyboard
specs: Split key design with natural arc layout
Cushioned palm rest for wrist support
products.why: A great, budget-friendly way to move into ergonomic typing. It provides excellent wrist support and a more natural typing angle without a high price tag.

Standard Keyboard & Mouse.title: Standard Keyboard & Mouse
reasons: Comfortable keyboard and mouse for everyday use
Reliable wireless connection keeps your desk clean
Familiar layout that is easy to get used to

products.name: Logitech MK345 Combo
specs: Contoured wireless mouse for right-handed use
Built-in palm rest for extra comfort
products.why: A step above basic combos, the MK345 adds a palm rest and better mouse ergonomics. It's the perfect daily workhorse for most home users.

Basic Keyboard & Mouse.title: Basic Keyboard & Mouse
reasons: Simple, reliable keyboard and mouse that get the job done
Very affordable and easy to replace
Simple setup - just plug in the tiny USB receiver

products.name: Logitech MK270 Wireless Combo
features: Best-selling wireless combo in the world
Full-size keyboard with shortcut keys
Compact mouse for home or travel
Single USB receiver for both devices
Very reliable wireless connection
products.why: The gold standard for simple computing. It's affordable, reliable, and does exactly what you need without any complicated features.

Compact Keyboard & Mouse.title: Compact Keyboard & Mouse
reasons: Space-saving design perfect for smaller desks

products.name: Logitech K380 + M350 Pebble
features: Ultra-compact and very lightweight
Bluetooth switches between 3 devices (computer, tablet, phone)
Whisper-quiet typing and clicking
Mouse is slim enough to fit in a pocket
Beautiful minimalist aesthetic
products.why: Perfect for small desks or anyone who likes to move around with their computer. The keyboard is surprisingly comfortable despite its small size.

products.name: Logitech MK470 Slim Combo
features: Modern, ultra-thin design
Whisper-quiet typing and clicking
Compact layout saves desk space
Reliable wireless connection
Looks great with modern laptops
products.why: If you want your desk to look clean and modern, this is the best combo. It's incredibly quiet, making it great for shared living spaces.

Laptop Accessories & Upgrades.title: Laptop Accessories & Upgrades
reasons: Enhance your laptop experience with helpful additions
Raising your screen reduces neck and back pain
External mouse is much more precise than a trackpad

products.name: Laptop Stand + External Mouse
features: Adjustable stand raises screen to eye level
Reduces neck strain from hunching over
Wireless mouse for better hand comfort
Transforms laptop into a small desktop
Easy to pack away when not in use
products.why: The best improvement for any laptop user. Raising the screen to eye level will instantly make your neck and shoulders feel better during long sessions.
